name: Dragon VS Princess
description:
Love–hate relationship with fire and kisses

Highlights :

  • 1 VS 1 player.
  • 60 seconds countdown.
  • One Magic Mirror.
  • FPA - Frantic Platforming Action!!

The game mechanic consists on killing the other player, during 1 minute round. During this round a magic mirror that change the player role is spawned. This game requires 2 human players and Chrome Browser that allow control pad support.

How to play:

Controls (2 Control Pad or keyboard) :

Playstation Pad scheme:

    • Digital Pad (left - right)
    • Square (attack)
    • Cross (jump)

XBox Pad scheme:

    • Digital Pad (left - right)
    • X (attack)
    • A (jump)

Keyboard scheme:

Player 1

    • A (left)
    • D (right)
    • W (jump)
    • Q (attack)

Player 2

    • UP
    • LEFT
    • RIGHT
    • M (attack)

Credits:

A game made for Global Game Jam 2014 in Game Jam Barcelona 2014 (link)
